title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8500.2 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8500.2 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of the office is to provide comprehensive permit
information, one-stop service for permit applicants, and the coordination of
permit processing and review. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8500.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
